modName: Woodcutters Axe and Mining Pick Weight Reduction
descriptionHtml:
If wanted I can expand to other items, feel free to ask.

Please note no other values were touched so it is compatible with any mod that does not edit the values listed below:

Woodcutter\'s Axe: Weight change to 5 from 10
Mining Pick: Weight change to 5 from 10
RockSplinter\'s Axe: Weight change to 5 from 10
Poacher\'s Axe: Weight change to 5 from 10
Firewood: Weight change to 1.5 from 5

If another mod changes the above values you have to choose between the plugins in terms of priority in load order. Lower load order (From first on list after .esm files to last on list) mods that are active will always have priority in-game for the edits they make to the game.
author: BornDownUnder
